resources.string: Go in front of a mirror.
The pattern should be matched\nwith your teeth.
The process of\nlightening\nthe color of teeth

such as cavities,
abscessed teeth,
tooth traumas, etc.

overhang, improper root
canal treatment, restoration

1- How long has it been hurting?
Cold, less than 30\'\' linger after cold gone
Hot/cold, more than 30\'\' linger after stimulus gone

Your Oral Hygiene is very good But, better brushing everyday.
Share with your friends or dentist to let them know your result.
problems were found in your teeth.
Outstanding work!! Way to go %s. Keep going this way of caring for your teeth
Great job!! Go on the amazing work. Don\'t forget to floss. You are not far from having the perfect teeth.
You\'re doing well!! Keep up the great work and brush twice a day. Your teeth are going to sparkle and stay healthy!
Nice work! Don\'t forget to floss and make sure you brush before bed to have a bright smile.
Good job %s! To have sparkle teeth, you should take better care of your teeth by brushing them twice a day
You can do better %s!! Brush your teeth twice a day, and don\'t rinse with water straight after it to help keep your teeth and mouth healthy.
Let\'s try a little harder. You can do it! Brush twice a day and floss daily. Try to avoid sweet drinks and food, or rinse after eating sweets.
You should pay more attention to your dental care routine! Make sure you thoroughly clean your teeth at least twice a day and flossing before it!
We really want you to have a healthy and bright smile. Let\'s work harder and brush at least twice a day and try to make sure you brush every surface of all your teeth.
You\'d better look after your teeth more carefully. Don\'t forget to floss and limit sugar intake! You can get back on track!
Oh no! Let\'s help you get back on track %s. Make brushing your teeth a habit. Remember, regular flossing may also reduce dental problems.
Is a sign of acid erosion and normally occurs in patient with meticulous oral hygiene.
If a crack runs from the top of the tooth to the gum or below. This is a serious issue.
Referes to instances where the inflammation is mild and the tooth pulp remains healthy enough to save.
Occurs when inflammations and other symptoms, such as pain, are severe, and the pulp can not be saved.
When the pulp is nucretic, you have irreversible pultips. In this case, you may need a root canal or a tooth extraction.
Are disorders that evelop from problems with the fit between upper and lower teeth and the jaw joint.
It has several possible reasons including dental fluorosis, enamel hypoplasia, poor dental hygiene, and eating too many acidic or sugary foods.
Amalgam filling is a silver-like dental filling material used to fill cavities caused by tooth decay .
It is a crusty deposit that can trap stains on the teeth and cause discoloration.It creates a strong bond that can only be removed by a dental professional.
dental caries , also known as tooth decay , is the breakdown of teeth due to acids made by bacteria .
Occurs when your nasal cavities become infected, swollen, and inflamed. It is mostly caused by viruses.
Re-take the photo. You must keep it still for a second after the vibration.
The taken photo is blurry. Please take another image which should be clear.
This picture is not correct. you should upload a picture from %S.
Re-take the photo. You must keep it still for a second after the vibration.
The distance between your mouth and\nyour camera should be about the size\nof a palm.
When the app detects your teeth, it\nvibrates, then you should keep your\ncellphone for a second.
Congratulations %s\nStrAIberry hasn’t found any issues\non your %s.
